reuze

Class ib_FilterChannelMix

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterPoint
        • reuze.ib_FilterChannelMix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterChannelMix
extends ib_a_FilterPoint
    A filter which allows the red, green and blue channels of an image to be mixed into each other.
